title: LF Peeps to play Normal
body:
Hai guys, 

looking for peeps that are chill and wanna have fun and give me advice im still learning after been afk from LoL for few months and I want to get back into the hang of the game. I do want to do ranked after im use to meta/game. I do have mic and mainly use discord or teamspeak.

Add me if you guys wants :)
